name: Your Merman Boyfriend
description:
-FULL SCREEN RECOMMENDED-

YOUR MERMAN BOYFRIEND is a short text adventure and/or quiz about, well, your merman boyfriend. Pick and choose everything about him to get one of three different endings!

A Twine game by Wally-S about merfolk, boyfriends, and the fantasy of making enough money to support your partner financially. Features three endings; around a 10 minute experience.
